version_description: Bright light table extended all the way to the edge of the iPhone X!

Outline mode is now adjustable when photo is locked.
This way you can find your lines without moving your image.
The slider is also bigger, making it easier to control.

New features for iPhone X, XR, XS:
— Home Bar hides after a delay when Trace Table is locked.
— Home Bar and Control Center gestures now take two swipes to open, so you're less likely to do them on accident while drawing!
Everybody:
— All new camera in full-screen glory!
— Camera pics now load full-screen too, but can still be resized however you would like.
— Improved brightness tracking — fixed a bug where sometimes the screen wasn't the brightest it could be, or didn't return to your previous brightness when the app closed.
